name: Climb The Tower (ZorbN)
description:
(Play the desktop version for the best experience! Your high score on the web version will be reset every time the game is updated due to limitations with itch.io)

Climb the ever changing tower and:

  • Face 4 enemies that increase in difficulty every 50 points
  • Unlock 10 costumes
  • Discover 18 different items
  • And more!

Can you climb to 1000?
